waitFor

public Message waitFor(MessageFilter filter,
                       ByteCounter ctr)
                throws DisconnectedException
Wait for a filter to trigger, or timeout. Blocks until either the trigger is activated, or it times out, or the peer is disconnected.

Parameters:
filter - The filter to wait for.
ctr - Byte counter to add bytes from the message to.
Returns:
Either a message, or null if the filter timed out.
Throws:
DisconnectedException - If the single peer being waited for disconnects.

send

public void send(PeerContext destination,
                 Message m,
                 ByteCounter ctr)
          throws NotConnectedException
Send a Message to a PeerContext.

Throws:
NotConnectedException - If we are not currently connected to the node.

Returns:
the number of received messages that are currently unclaimed
